fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: During the day, push someone into the CORE.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Everyone will be notified of this, regardless if they have defense or not. The town will not learn your name, but they will learn the name of the one you pushed into the CORE.
- If they cannot be pushed into the CORE, then it will take one less vote to hang them that day.
- Players with effects that prevent votes from being cast on them (Such as a Guardian Angel's Protect) cannot be pushed into the CORE
